author: barnabasbusa
content:
Teku/erigon pair throwing this error: ```2023-01-06 08:46:06.272 ERROR - Failed to update eth1 chain head
java.lang.NullPointerException: Cannot invoke "org.web3j.protocol.core.methods.response.EthBlock$Block.getTimestamp()" because "headBlock" is null
at tech.pegasys.teku.beacon.pow.TimeBasedEth1HeadTracker.isOldEnough(TimeBasedEth1HeadTracker.java:189) ~[teku-beacon-pow-develop.jar:22.12.0+68-g16fc563]
at tech.pegasys.teku.beacon.pow.TimeBasedEth1HeadTracker.lambda$init$0(TimeBasedEth1HeadTracker.java:76) ~[teku-beacon-pow-develop.jar:22.12.0+68-g16fc563]``` Anyone from teku/erigon could take a look?

author: djrtwo
content: This is going in the capella rc release today. I think we should shift to rc-0 for devnets asap (next week?)

author: barnabasbusa
content: We would like to begin a new devnet with as many final specs as possible. I'm all for starting up devnet2 and shutting down devnet1 if we have at least 2/2 clients that have all final specs implemented.

author: barnabasbusa
content: If we only have a single client from either EL or CL then I don't see much reason to push it already for early next week. Please client teams reach out and let us know what your pgoress on rc-0.

author: jgm
content: With the change to the beacon state definition in 3165 I'd like to see the `BeaconState` SSZ data in `consensus-spec-tests` updated.
